articles.title: European Central Bank might beat the Fed to interest rate cuts - Axios

articles.author: Martin Arnold, Mary McDougall
articles.title: European Central Bank holds interest rates at 4% in contested decision - Financial Times
articles.description: Some policymakers backed cut at Thursday’s meeting as bank signals it will consider such a step in June
articles.content:
The European Central Bank sent a strong signal that it would consider cutting interest rates at its next meeting in June after holding them at all-time highs on Thursday.
